nodes.text: The Zephyr Light Combat Fighter was a model of starfighter produced by Mestapol. Vohrkrewel Yahrkar owned a Zephyr Light Combat Fighter named the Blood Hawk.

The Zephyr Light Combat Fighter appears in West End Games' roleplaying game book The Politics of Contraband. Classic Adventures, which includes a reprint of The Politics of Contraband, misspells it as "Zephyer".
